Competition to become the go-to crypto native messaging platform is intensifying with data analytics platform Nansen joining the race. Nansen launched a crypto-native messaging platform currently open in beta to their paid users as well as token-holders of select communities, the company said in an emailed statement.   The platform, Nansen Connect, was built as a …
